channel.title: FurkanScape Development Team (recruting)
channel.description:
[center]FurkanScape Development Team [/center]
I am Starting a new FurkanScape Development Team! I really need all the spots to be filled out. I need coders that can make silab items work I need forum mods and admins that can acually do their job I need in-game admins and mods to do their job correcly Add me in msn: furk_da_turk@hotmail.com
Information about server: Fully working specials 3 Working Quests To weild weapons you need to kill monsters To level in Combat skills you need to kill monsters. Pking Works Fully working magic Servers base is BattleScape Blitz Forums have finished
[font=Green]Some updates: Working Silab Working Minigames Working Commands Working Item Bonuses Working God Swords with Specials [/font]
[center]Staff so far:[/center] [center]Coders -zilchuary -Paintball199 -Khasck -Exist2inspire -Digzey -[/center]
[center]Client Makers -Khasck -C0rn L33 -[/center]
[center]Admins -Paintball199 -owned112 -Loremaster -Khasck[/center]
[center]Mods -C0rn L33 -thomas121794 -Fate -Dome106 -Digzey[/center]
[center]Advertisers -seanmac7 -Fate -Dome106[/center]
[center]Forum Mods And Admins -seanmac7(admin) -Loremaster(mod) -Khasck(admin) -Exist2inspire(mod) -rs w00dcut(mod)[/center]
I really need all these spots to be filled out Use this format if you want to register for my dev team [code]Name: Msn Name: Job: Coder XP: Why do you want: Will you leave us:[/code] Thank you for reading
Thankz to Pwnd for approving our forums furkanscapev2.smffofree3.com :)

item.title: FurkanScape Development Team (recruting)
item.dc:creator: @Ixl_Adds_Ixl Ixl Adds Ixl
item.description:
@Ixl_Adds_Ixl wrote:

[code]public class KAHleader extends Jackasses {

      public static final void main(String args[]) {

            String maron = " stupid asshole. *"
            int days = 80;

    System.out.println("You are an idiot you"+maron+"This guy hasn't even logged in for like "+days+" days.");
   }

}[/code]

init:
deps-jar:
compile-single:
run-single:
You are an idiot you stupid asshole. *This guy hasn’t even logged in for like 80 days.
BUILD SUCCESSFUL (total time: 0 seconds)

Read full topic

item.title: FurkanScape Development Team (recruting)
item.dc:creator: @k_a_h_leader Aeolian
item.description:
@k_a_h_leader wrote:

Name: Jeffreh

You may know me as Kurt Cobain. (From Zs)

Msn Name:Jeffreh@live.com

Job:Server, Client Coder

Coder XP: I have been coding for a long time. One good thing about me is I make up my own codes and I never use TUTs so it makes me origonal. If you want to see what I have done I can let you on my server which I have only spent about a day on, its pretty epic.

Why do you want: Because you and I have been friends for awhile ever since you played ZareScape. Plus I get bored of hosting servers so I like to help other people

Will you leave us: I will try not to, but everyone will leave at one point in their lives.

Anyways, Good luck and I hope your server is a success.

Read full topic
